verbose_text: We found that GSDMD silencing, but not the inhibition of pannexin-1 channels, abrogated pyroptosis and caspase-1 activation in response to EPEC infection (XREF_FIG A, 2D, and XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY I).
evidence: GSDMD silencing, but not the inhibition of pannexin-1 channels, abrogated pyroptosis and caspase-1
